duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide pet parents with exceptional dog training instruction and customer service.
Act as a subject matter expert for Petco’s Positive Dog Training Program products, services, and in-store promotions.
Assist in achieving the store’s budgeted sales goals by driving sales, while educating and engaging all store partners.
Follow Petco’s Positive Dog Training curriculums and methodologies to enhance communication and teamwork between dog and pet parent.
Create a fun and safe environment for dogs, pet parents, and store partners.

education_certification.credential: Completion of the Dog Training Instructor Program (DTIP) to become a Petco certified Positive Dog Trainer.
